short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts all pages to use the Dotsies font.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switches all websites to use the Dotsies font, an alternative to the Latin alphabet optimized for speed-reading. Can be easily toggled for learning purposes. http://dotsies.org/
